name: Levis
description: Luxury French fashion house Saint Laurent prides itself on constructing high-quality accessories, as showcased by this black belt, new to the brand's AW17 collection. Expertly constructed from Italian leather and brass, the belt features a long length, a buckle fastening, eyelets and a silver-tone logo plaque..
